title: CM Giglit-Baltistan calls on Federal Minister Amir Muqam
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 25 (APP):Federal Minister for Kashmir Affairs & GB and SAFRON Engr Amir Muqam on Thursday said that government would take all possible measures for the development of Gilgit-Baltistan.
In a meeting with Chief Minister Gilgit-Baltistan Haji Gulbar Khan, he said Gilgit-Baltistan had vast tourism potential which had not fully been exploited, said a press release.
He said that Prime Minister would soon visit Gilgit Baltistan.
Amir Muqam said that government was taking steps for the welfare of Gilgit-Baltistan people.
